Events

toggle

Trigger this event to toggle a submenu between being opened and closed.


Code example:

$("#my-menu").mmenu();
$("#my-menu ul#submenu-1").trigger( "toggle.mm" );
  • Events for the menu:
  • open
  • close
  • toggle
  • Other events:
  • setPage
  • setSelected
  • Events for submenus
    • open
    • close
    • toggle
  • Events for the searchfield
    • search
    • reset
